name: The Ranger with the magic bow
name_original: The Ranger with the magic bow
description:
The Ranger (with the magic bow) is a minimalist platformer game where you will have to guide a ranger girl through a dungeon, and use her magic bow to solve the dungeon puzzles.

Think your way, try to get there using the different magic arrows, and get all gems!

After completing the 15 levels, you can try Time Mode, and also unlock a Bonus Level.
